title: Exposing Myth of the Islamic Jesus
description:

So who lied? Was it the disciples or Muhammad? Read about it in this terrific article by Muslim turned Christian Kashmiri evangelist Rashid Alamir.

Since the Bible and the Torah are banned in Islamic societies, such material is the only known source of knowledge about Christianity for Muslims.
